text: aur shirk karne waali aurto se ta waqt ye ke51 wo imaan na laaye tum nikaah na karo, imaan waali laundi bhi shirk karne waali azaad aurath se bahuth behtar hai, go tumhe mushrika hee acchi lagti ho, aur na shirk karne waale mardo ke nikaah mein apni aurto ko do jab tak wo imaan na laaye, imaan waala ghulaam azaad mushrik se behtar hai, go mushrik tumhe accha lage, ye log jahannam ki taraf bulaate hai aur Allah jannath ki taraf aur apni baqshish ki taraf apne hukm se bulaata hai, wo apni aayate logo ke liye bayaan farma raha hai, ta ke wo nasihath haasil kare
